title: The existing authorized uses in the zone that are not listed in the permissible uses will be allowed
clause_text: The existing authorized uses in the zone that are not listed in the permissible uses will be allowed to continue and will not be considered as non-conforming

source_pdf.text_snippet: The existing authorized uses in the zone that are not listed in the permissible uses will be allowed to continue and will not be considered as non-conforming
